RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Conjure Animals
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: You summon fey spirits that take the form of beasts and appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Cure Wounds
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Daylight
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: A 60-foot radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Lightning Arrow
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: The next time you make a ranged weapon attack during the spell's duration, the weapon's ammunition, or the weapon itself if it's a thrown weapon, transforms into a bolt of lightning.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Nondetection
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from divination magic.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Plant Growth
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: This spell channels vitality into plants within a specific area.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Protection from Energy
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Speak with Plants
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: You imbue plants within 30 feet of you with limited sentience and animation.

RangerLevel3Spells.Name: Water Walk
RangerLevel3Spells.Description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground.
